name: equivalent
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having the same amount, value, purpose, qualities, etc.

example.eg: She's doing the equivalent job in the new company but for more money.
example.egtrans: 她在新公司做同样的工作，但薪水比以前高。
50美元是不是大约相当于30英镑？

name: equivalent
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: something that has the same amount, value, purpose, qualities, etc. as something else

example.eg: There is no English equivalent for "bon appetit" so we have adopted the French expression.
example.egtrans: 英语中没有和 bon appetit 相对应的词，所以我们就借用了法语的这个表达方式。

example.eg: Ten thousand people a year die of the disease - that's the equivalent of the population of this town.
example.egtrans: 每年有一万人死于这种疾病——该数字相当于这个城镇的总人口。
